newsitem.title: CANADA: Imperial Oil raises posted oil prices.
newsitem.headline: Imperial Oil raises posted oil prices.

text.p: Imperial Oil Ltd said it raised the price it would pay for some grades of crude oil by C$6.00/cubic metre or C$0.95/barrel, effective immediately.

The new prices were listed as follows: Edmonton light sweet C$215.00/cubic metre, or C$34.18/barrel Cromer light sour C$208.00/cubic metre, or C$33.07/barrel Bow River at Hardisty C$175.00/cubic metre, or C$27.82/barrel Midale at Cromer C$183.00/cubic metre, or C$29.09/barrel ((Reuters Calgary Bureau (403) 531-1624))
